mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CoPhotos (co_targetId, co_uuId, co_fileName, co_filePath, co_fileUrl, co_fileDownloadPath, co_fileSize) VALUES (#{co_projectId}, #{co_uuId}, #{co_fileName}, #{co_filePath}, #{co_fileUrl}, #{co_fileDownloadPath}, #{co_fileSize})
mapper.select: select co_targetId, co_uuId, co_fileName, co_filePath, co_fileUrl, co_fileDownloadPath, co_fileSize from CoPhotos where co_targetId = #{co_projectId}
select co_targetId, co_uuId, co_fileName, co_filePath, co_fileUrl, co_fileDownloadPath, co_fileSize from CoPhotos where co_uuId = #{co_uuId}
